text: waqt alhaju 'ashhur melwmat, why: shwal, wadhu alqedt, weshr min dhi alhj. faman awjb alhaji ealaa nafsih fihina bal'ihram, fyhrm ealayh aljmae wmqdmath alqwlyt walfelyt, wayuharim ealayh alkhuruj ean taeat allah taealaa bifiel almeasy, waljdal fi alhaji aldhy yuadiy 'iilaa alghadab walkrahy. wama tafealuu min khayr yaelamh allh, fyjazy kulaaan ealaa eamalihi. wakhudhuu li'anfusikum zadana min altaeam walshrab lsfr alhj, wzadana min salih al'aemal lldar alakhrt, fa'iina khayr alzaad taqwaa allh, wkhafwny ya 'ashab aleqwl alslymt
